AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry exists in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqssh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for SSHConfig: Checks whether the ssh version is at 7.0 or greater.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_logindisable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable login after unsuccessful login attempts: Specifies 10 as the number of unsuccessful login attempts on a port before the port is locked.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_loginreenable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Reenable login after locking: Specifies the time interval (360 minutes) after which a port is unlocked after being disabled by logindisable.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Delay between unsuccessful logins: Specifies the delay between unsuccessful logins to 5 seconds.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_logintimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login timeout: Specifies the time interval (60 seconds) to type in a password.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_logininterval
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Interval between unsuccessful logins: Specifies the time interval (300 seconds) for a port in which the unsuccessful login attempts must occur before the port is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_corelimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Core Dumps: Set the core limit in the default stanza to 0 in /etc/security/limits.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_corehardlimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Core Dumps: Set the core_hard limit in the default stanza to 0 in /etc/security/limits.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rsslimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Resource Limits: Limit the system default of soft real memory usage in blocks (rss) to 65535.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rsshardlimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Resource Limits: Limit the system default of hard real memory usage in blocks (rss_hard) to 65535.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_stacklimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Resource Limits: Limit the system default of soft stack segment size in blocks (stack) to 65535.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_stackhardlimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Resource Limits: Limit the system default of hard stack segment size in blocks (stack_hard) to 65535.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_pwdintchk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password Integrity Check: Ensures that users password being set is not weak.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rootumask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Object creation permissions: Specifies root object creation permissions (umask) to 077.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rlogindaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login restrictions: Set remote login (rlogin) for user daemon to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_logindaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login restrictions: Set local login (login) for user daemon to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rloginsys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login restrictions: Set remote login (rlogin) for user sys to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_loginsys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login restrictions: Set local login (login) for user sys to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rloginbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login restrictions: Set remote login (rlogin) for user bin to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_loginbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login restrictions: Set local login (login) for user bin to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rloginadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login restrictions: Set remote login (rlogin) for user adm to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_loginadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Login restrictions: Set local login (login) for user adm to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_clean_partial_conns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option clean_partial_conns: Set the value of the network option clean_partial_conns to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ipsrcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipsrcrouteforward: Set the value of the network option ipsrcrouteforward to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ipsrcroutesend
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipsrcroutesend: Set the value of the network option ipsrcroutesend to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ipsrcrouterecv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipsrcrouterecv: Set the value of the network option ipsrcrouterecv to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_nonlocsrcroute
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option nonlocsrcroute: Set the value of the network option nonlocsrcroute to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ip6srcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ip6srcrouteforward: Set the value of the network option ip6srcrouteforward to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ipsendredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipsendredirects: Set the value of the network option ipsendredirects to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ipignoreredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipignoreredirects: Set the value of the network option ipignoreredirects to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ipforwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option ipforwarding: Set the value of the network option ipforwarding to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_directed_broadcast
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option directed_broadcast: Set the value of the network option directed_broadcast to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_icmpaddressmask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option icmpaddressmask: Set the value of the network option icmpaddressmask to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_bcastping
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option bcastping: Set the value of the network option bcastping to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_tcp_pmtu_discover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_pmtu_discover: Set the value of the network option tcp_pmtu_discover to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_udp_pmtu_discover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option udp_pmtu_discover: Set the value of the network option udp_pmtu_discover to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_tcp_mssdflt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_mssdflt: Set the value of the network option tcp_mssdflt to 1448.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_tcp_tcpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_tcpsecure: Set the value of the network option tcp_tcpsecure to 7.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sockthresh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option sockthresh: Set the value of the network option sockthresh to 60.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshdaemonprotocol
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must be configured to only use the SSHv2 protocol.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshUsePrivilege
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must use privilege separation.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshBanner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must use a banner message for login.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshStrictMode
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must perform strict mode checking of home directory configuration files.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshIgnoreRhosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must ignore .rhosts and .shosts files.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshPermitEmptyPasswords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon should not allow login for accounts with empty passwords.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshPubkeyAuthentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon must allow public key authentication.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshPasswordAuthentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon should not allow password authentication.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshHostbasedAuthentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon should not allow host-based authentication.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshLogLevel
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon syslog severity should be set to INFO.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshMaxAuthTries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon should permit a maximum of 4 authentication attempts per connection.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshClientAliveCountMax
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon should permit a maximum of 300 client keep alive messages without answer before disconnecting the session.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshClientAliveInterval
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon should disable sending of client alive messages.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshPermitUserEnvironment
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon should not allow user environment processing specified in ~/.ssh/environment and environment= options in ~/.ssh/authorized_keys.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshAllowTcpForwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon should allow TCP forwarding due to usage of VNC.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshX11Forwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH daemon should not allow X11 forwarding.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sshclientprotocol
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: The SSH client must be configured to only use SSHv2 protocol.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rmdotfrmpathroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove dot from root path: Removes the dot from the PATH environment variable in files .profile, .kshrc, .cshrc, and .login in the root home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_dtspc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable dtspc in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for dtspc daemon in /etc/inetd.conf when LFT is not configured and CDE is disabled in /etc/inittab, and kills all instances of dtspc daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_comsat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable comsat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for comsat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of comsat.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_uucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable uucp in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for uucp daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of uucpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_bootps
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable bootps in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for bootps daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of bootpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_fingerd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable finger in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for finger daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of fingerd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_systat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable systat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for systat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of systat.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_netstat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable netstat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for netstat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of netstat.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable tftp in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for tftp daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable ftp in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for ftp daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_telnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable telnet in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for telnet daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of telnetd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_shell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable shell in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for shell daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_kshell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable kshell in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for kshell daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of krshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable login in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for login daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_krlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable klogin in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for klogin daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of krlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rexecd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable exec in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for exec daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rexecd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_instsrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable instsrv in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for instsrv daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of instsrv.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_talk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable talk in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for talk daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of talkd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ntalk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable ntalk in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for ntalk daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ntalkd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rquotad
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable rquotad in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rquotad daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rquotad.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rexd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable rexd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rexd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rexd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rstatd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable rstatd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rstatd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rstatd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rusersd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable rusersd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rusersd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rusersd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_rwalld
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable rwalld in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rwalld daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rwalld.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_sprayd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable sprayd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for sprayd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of sprayd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_pcnfsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable pcnfsd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for pcnfsd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of pcnfsd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_tcpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_udpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_tcpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_udpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_tcpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_udpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_tcpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of daytime(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_udpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of daytime(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_tcptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of time(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_udptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of time(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_imapd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable imapd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for imapd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of imapd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_pop3d
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable pop3d in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for pop3d daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of pop3d.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_cmsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable cmsd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of cmsd.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_ttdbserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable ttdbserver in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of ttdbserver.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_dissnmpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable SNMP daemon: Stops SNMP daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disaixmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable AIXMIBD daemon: Stops AIXMIBD daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_dishostmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable HOSTMIBD daemon: Stops HOSTMIBD daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_dissnmpmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable SNMPMIBD daemon: Stops SNMPMIBD daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disdpid2dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable DPID2 daemon: Stops DPID2 daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_dissendmaildmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable SENDMAIL daemon: Stops SENDMAIL daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disdhcpcddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable DHCPCD daemon: Stops DHCPCD daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disdhcprddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable DHCPRD daemon: Stops DHCPRD daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disdhcpsddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable DHCPSD daemon: Stops DHCPSD daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disautoconf6dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable AUTOCONF6 daemon: Stops AUTOCONF6 daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disgateddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable GATED daemon: Stops GATED daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_dismrouteddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable MROUTED daemon: Stops MROUTED daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disnameddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable NAMED daemon: Stops NAMED daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disrouteddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable ROUTED daemon: Stops ROUTED daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disrwhoddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable RWHOD daemon: Stops RWHOD daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_distimeddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable TIMED daemon: Stops TIMED daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disndpdhostdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable NDPD-HOST daemon: Stops NDPD-HOST daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disndpdrouterdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable NDPD-ROUTER daemon: Stops NDPD-ROUTER daemon and comments its entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disqdaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable qdaemon: Stops qdaemon and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disrcnfs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable rcnfs: Stops rcnfs and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_disdt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable dt: Stops dt and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_dislpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable lpd daemon: Stops lpd daemon and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_dispiobe
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimal Machine: Disable piobe daemon: Stops piobe daemon and comments its entry in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Maximum age for password: Specifies the maximum number of weeks (24 weeks) that a password is valid.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Minimum age for password: Specifies the minimum number of weeks to 1 week, before a password can be changed.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Minimum length for password: Specifies the minimum length of a password to 10 characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Minimum number of alphabetic characters: Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_minloweralpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Minimum number of lowercase alphabetic characters: Specifies the minimum number of lowercase alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_minupperalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Minimum number of uppercase alphabetic characters: Specifies the minimum number of uppercase alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_mindigit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Minimum number of digits: Specifies the minimum number of digits in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_minspecialchar
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Minimum number of special characters: Specifies the minimum number of special characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Minimum number of non-alphabetic characters: Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Minimum number of characters: Specifies the minimum number of characters that were present in the previous password that cannot be used in the new password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Maximum times a character can appear in a password: Specifies the maximum number of times a character can appear in a password to 3.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Password reuse: Specifies the number of weeks before a password can be reused to 24.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Password reuse limit: Specifies the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse to 24.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Time to change password after the expiration: Specifies the maximum time (in weeks) beyond the maxage value that a user can change an expired password to 3.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_pwdwarntime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Password expiration warning time: Specifies the number of days to 20 days, before the system issues a warning that a password change is required.

AIXPertEntry.name: sapv1_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local Accounts: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 3, for each non-root user account before the account is disabled.
